gapDegree (type=circle).description: the gap degree of half circle, 0 ~ 360

gapPosition (type=circle).description: the gap position, options: top bottom left right

showInfo.description: whether to display the progress value and the status icon

status.description: to set the status of the Progress, options: normal success exception active

strokeWidth (type=line).description: to set the width of the progress bar, unit: px

strokeWidth (type=circle).description: to set the width of the circular progress bar, unit: percentage of the canvas width

strokeLinecap.description: to set the style of the progress linecap

successPercent.description: segmented success percent, works when type="line"

type.description: to set the type, options: line circle dashboard

width (type=circle).description: to set the canvas width of the circular progress bar, unit: px
